mapper.select: select t2.id, t2.menu_name as menuName, t2.menu_url as menuUrl, t2.parent_id as parentId, t2.is_dir as isDir, t2.sort, t2.creator, t2.create_time as createTime, t2.`status` from tb_sys_permission_menu t1 , tb_sys_menu t2 where t1.menu_id = t2.id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.permission_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, menu_name as menuName, menu_url as menuUrl, parent_id as parentId, is_dir as isDir, sort, creator, create_time as createTime, `status` from tb_sys_menu where id not in (select t2.id from tb_sys_permission_menu t1 , tb_sys_menu t2 where t1.menu_id = t2.id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.permission_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and `status` = '1'
